title: Timberwolves typeface - similar to Walshes {Tom DeForest, self}
content:
This one is hand drawn by our man in the Philippines. Can anyone help me find something like this:   
   
 ![image.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017151307im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1119.jpg)
author: graficartist

comments.content:
Wait a second... That "Buccaneers" is a rip-off of Licko's "Totally Gothic". Somebody should tell them to pull it off the site.   
   
hhp
Stuart - you don't know how long we've been looking for that font. Many thanks!
I do not think it is close enough to Totally Gothic to call it a rip off although it is somewhat similar.

Go to the site Stuart pointed to, and compare the second font (Buccaneer) to the text "TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS" set in Emigre's Typetease. They're the same. Anyway, it seems it's "not available for download", so no biggie.   
   
\> I think Hrant must have seen three ghosts during the night.   
   
You mean like from a Clive Barker movie?   
   
hhp

Ray Larabie makes a font called Welshes that looks a lot like it. Thanks for your help everyone.   
   
Tom   
   
 [http://www.larabiefonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017151307/http:/www.larabiefonts.com/)
I think Hrant must have seen three ghosts during the night. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017151307im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
